name: Pizza Game Chef Tools
description:
Pizza Game is a decentralized remake of our favorite childhood online
game, Cookie Clicker. We decided to take a simple game loved by all and
make it play to earn. After weeks of hard work, it is finally time to
reveal the rules to this classic, addicting, incremental childhood game!
In order to play Pizza Game you must purchase a Pizza Chef and stake
them on our website (coming soon). Chefs produce $Pizza every minute
that you can claim and use to purchase upgrades. Chefs will be sold
through our NFT drop and will be your golden ticket to the Pizza Game.
